title: Baba.Day0.Intro.Start2
body:
You do not get to talk!
Do you know why you're here?
[[No...|Baba.Day0.Intro.Start3]]

title: Baba.Day0.Intro.Start3
body:
During processing you were scanned for reacting to Kstone
And, congradulations, you do.
While the mine produces Coal and steel, Kstone is what's added at the very
end to give the metals its strength
Only creatures who react to Kstone are able to find it
This is where you'll come in
You will be going down into the Kstone shafts with another team of slaves
Every day, you will meet your quota, you'll be put back into the mine if you
come up under quota.
